events.content:
Subject: Re: Proposal Meeting

Hi Tyler,

Following up on our call - I'd like to schedule a meeting with you and Vlad to discuss the partnership proposal.

Can we do Thursday at 2pm? I'll send a calendar invite once confirmed.

Best,
Jeff Martinez
Senior VP of Partnerships
CLEAR Data Solutions
jeff.martinez@cleardata.com
+1-512-555-9876
events.subject: Re: Proposal Meeting

events.content:
Subject: Re: Proposal Meeting

Hi Jeff,

Thursday at 2pm works for me. I'll loop in Vlad.

Tyler
